item_category: Aznu is a new way of buying that premium branded phone you always wanted, but at a much more pocket-friendly price. With Aznu, you get a refurbished phone with the same camera, features and processor, plus a brand-new screen and a 12-month warranty. You also have the knowledge that buying Aznu helps reduce landfill and waste. We include a Sim tool so it's easy to pop your old card in, a year's worth of Norton 360 VPN Virus and Spam protection, and a cable and charger so it's ready to go! If it looks like new, it must be Aznu.
review_title: S9 looks fab but no better than the s7
review_text:
Phone looks and feels brand new however
Firstly the bixby button.why under the volume down button so if in a call you go to press down but always push bixby.
The battery is worse than the s7 now charging twice a day. S9 is no faster than the 7. I love galaxy s series but it's never an improvement  best difference for me full screen
Amazing mobile we like it that model

Brilliant  Samsung Dual Sim Phone.
Does exactly what it was designed to.
Got this phone for my son for Christmas. It looked good as new. He loves it. Fast delivery also!!! Thanks argos.
